definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The paper explored the manufacturing process of substitute wollastonite flour for barium sulfide to produce the alkyd putty.
sentences.chinese: 探討了用硅灰石粉代替硫酸鋇製造醇酸膩子。

sentences.english: The barium sulfate must be a lump-free powder .
sentences.chinese: 硫酸鋇必須是無塊的粉末。

sentences.english: Barium sulfate as an extender pigment is widely used in paint.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸鋇作爲體質顏料廣泛應用於塗料中。

sentences.english: Barium sulfate turbidimetry and volumetric method are common methods.
sentences.chinese: 常用硫酸鋇比濁法和容量法來測定。

sentences.english: The barium sulfate must be a lump -free powder.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸鋇必須是無塊的粉末。
